notes: This bank mixes algorithmically generated items with a tiny hand-written base set inspired by KS2 outcomes.
You should add official GL familiarisation items and KS2 SATs OGL items by paraphrasing and noting attribution.
Do NOT copy from paid publishers (Bond, CGP, Atom, etc.).

sources.name: GL Assessment Familiarisation
sources.licence: Free samples for practice (check usage per PDF)

sources.name: BBC Bitesize
sources.licence: Free to link; paraphrase content rather than copying.

sources.name: NRICH
sources.licence: Free for educational use; paraphrase into MCQ format.
